overview:
About the Company :Pencilcoders is a young startup from BITS Pilani Undergaduates ! Its public Beta ! It is a Virtual Hangout Place for Computer Geeks , Tech Enthusiasts and FOSS Supporters !

No. of Vacancies : 5 presently , Can intake more if needed :)

Job Description : 1.Need a blogger who loves to write on Tech Rhymes ! (Key words and Links will be providedJ) 2.Market Research and Brainstorming 3.A Research Geek who loves to surf on Web ! 4.Controlling Social Media and Promoting the Site !

Skill set :

  1. Loves to work from home , and with uber cool programmers and Entrepreneurs..
  2. A Tech Enthusiast and Internet Obsessed Person ! 3.Social Media Awareness is must !
  3. Preferably a Undergraduate !

Job Perks 1.You get an awesome certificate and Recommendation Letter at the End of Internship ! 2.May Join the Team as a full time fellow !
